thread.title: Customer Jay Jasper
thread.title_full: Evermine reviewed by Customer Jay Jasper

author: Customer Jay Jasper
title: Customer Jay Jasper
text:
For those of you who think service is a thing of the past, here's one company which is totally committed to their customers' satisfaction.
Evermine does everything in their specialty to make sure their customers are happy with the work they do for them. And they do! Whether it's a specialty bookplate with a special message or something more generic in a special typeface, the specialists at Everymine are there to serve. I recommend them utterly for their expertise, patience and general excellence. Jay Jasper
